name: Birds Run: Epic Adventure Dash
description:
Birds hill have been invaded by alien monsters,
Now you have run and collect all the coins and diamonds to save other parrots birds, so avoid danger traps and smash enemies
FEATURES
* Simple one finger controls that are easy to use and just feel right * Use crazy powerups * Original 2D running mechanic combining jumping and smashing
* Play as different characters!
* Game Center Leaderboards to compete with your friends * Incredibly fun, just one more time, endless game play!

Game Controls:

Tap once to jump tap again to smash enemy Hold for longer jump

Download now for free and have fun !
